pullrequest.title: Added noise to rates and accels, with test, issue #615

content.raw: If the offset IMU_TOL is just to be complaint with floating point comparison (using ```EXPECT_NEAR```), I would go for using ```EXPECT_DOUBLE_EQ``` (see commit #facef32) and please merge it from *imu_noise_gtest_floating_point* branch.  If you think it is useful to control the offset, leave it as it.
content.html: If the offset IMU_TOL is just to be complaint with floating point comparison (using EXPECT_NEAR), I would go for using EXPECT_DOUBLE_EQ (see commit #facef32) and please merge it from imu_noise_gtest_floating_point branch. If you think it is useful to control the offset, leave it as it.
